artist: Artist: Kurt Wolfgang; Author: Bucky Sinister; Publisher: Kapow!, San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress and photomechanical illustration of two dead figures wh exaggerated heads lying on twin beds, printed in offsetlithography on dark green wove paper covers; 24 pp.
title: Tragedy and Bourbon
